channel.title: Need a 525 Emote? No problem!
channel.description:
If you need ANY 525 emote, give me the id here, an ill tell you if i can get it for you.
please note, 525 is before whips and new animations were updated (no moving whip when standing still)
So far i cannot get dragon emotes.

item.title: Need a 525 Emote? No problem!
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

This is dumb, just dump all the 525 emotes and create a list or release the software that gets them.
If you can’t do this or don’'t have the permission then tough.

Read full topic

item.title: Need a 525 Emote? No problem!
item.dc:creator: @Tonic Tonic
item.description:
@Tonic wrote:

[quote=“the elve age, post:9, topic:335574”][quote author=Tonic link=topic=431955.msg3171926#msg3171926 date=1270508187]

If you need ANY 525 emote, give me the id here, an ill tell you if i can get it for you.

please note, 525 is before whips and new animations were updated (no moving whip when standing still)

So far i cannot get 525 punch.

Dammit. Move this to Client hacking section…

Don’t flam me when your doing the exact same thing with the 525 anim frames and order dump that SWAT released
[/quote]

I never said it was my dumps… But the .dat’s i got permission to use.

Theres a difference doing this, and leeching (straight up copy and pasting) and sayings its yours.

I thought you were smarter to NOT do this. Guess not.[/quote]

I gave credit all the pvp weapon anims is 2571, also all I did was put the frames and delays in order and release it isn’t hard at all.
Dump for released Masmic barrage, I forgot it was so hard to put these frames&delays in order… :rolleyes:

------------Animation 10518---------------- file = 2571 ArrayLength = 17 frame[0] = 124 frame[1] = 122 frame[2] = 126 frame[3] = 167 frame[4] = 175 frame[5] = 59 frame[6] = 171 frame[7] = 118 frame[8] = 14 frame[9] = 82 frame[10] = 148 frame[11] = 72 frame[12] = 48 frame[13] = 38 frame[14] = 165 frame[15] = 2 frame[16] = 103 delay[0] = 2 delay[1] = 3 delay[2] = 3 delay[3] = 3 delay[4] = 3 delay[5] = 3 delay[6] = 2 delay[7] = 1 delay[8] = 3 delay[9] = 3 delay[10] = 3 delay[11] = 3 delay[12] = 3 delay[13] = 3 delay[14] = 3 delay[15] = 3 delay[16] = 3 Unknown true Unknown false anInt363 2 anInt364 0 anInt362 99 anInt360 -1 anInt361 -1 anInt359 5 Unknown -1

Read full topic
